page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The factories produce a variety of products including pipework, welded articles, ice-cream and computers. Approx 15 or so jobs usually provided in each factory are filled by local people from the Mold and Flint areas.Other new industries have been located at the old Ruby brickworks in Rhydymwyn and Rhosesmor. {Example of one firm on Rhydymwyn {Industrial Estate. Interview with {Mr Gray of the Gem Engineering {Company. June 27 1985 The Company deals in welding, pipework,sheet metalwork, and steel fabrication. Currently producing aviation tugs(small tractors used to pull aircraft out of hangers)for a Leicester firm. It employs 13 men and used to be sited at Marchwiel, Wrexham Industrial Estate but moved for a better and cleaner environment.
